 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָקַד‎</span>] **verb** ==bind== (Late Hebrew ***id., bind bent limbs together***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tie, tie fast***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> and especially <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bend, twist***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲקַד‎</span> as Late Hebrew; also ***kneel***, compare Christian Palestinian Aramaic, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 71</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּעֲקֹד אֶתיִֿצְחָק‎</span> [[Gen.22.9|Gen 22:9]].
